categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Quilb was a male Cathar Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Residing at the Jedi Temple on the planet Tython, Quilb was know by the Jedi for being fond of other species and taking in orphans. A baby Flesh Raider was found near Kaleth and brought to him. Quilb decided to bring the baby up in discussion with the Jedi Council before taking him in.
Quilb was originally named "Master Squib" in the game's conversation files.
